column5: Does anyone have opinions on game cameras? I take it they are great for hunting purpose but what about cottage and boat security to pick out who is snooping around. Whadyathink?  Game Cameras   CTC On Sale
My boss uses two of them to keep any eye on his cottage and his stocked trout pond.  He aught the nieghbour cleaning up on his spec's when he wasn't their.
great for hunting, and can be good for surveilance, but remember a thief may also take the camera if they can get to them, secure them well.  jason
